name: LastError
value: Exception (nntt): A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond.: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond. (www.nntt.org:80)

name: Add RUS to end of all titles to improve language detection by Sonarr and Radarr. Will cause English-only results to be misidentified.
